Francamente, este é um jogo antigo, mas, com uma das melhores histórias já vistas por mim.
Portal foi um dos jogos que iniciaram minha vida gamer, e hoje tenho orgulho disso, mas, além do apelo sentimental que tenho pela franquia, tenho de ser franco.
Portal 2 é um jogo de puzzle, com uma história única (GLaDOS I LOVE YOU), além de uma jogabilidade que, eu, considero fantastica dada a mecanica de jogo
UM DOS MELHORES JOGOS QUE JÁ COMPREI

10 гладосов из 10
Why haven't you played this game yet? Masterpiece, yet cheap.

After I played Portal I felt that it was one the best puzzle games I had ever played. I was like "Portal 2 probably won't be as good as Portal." 

I was completely wrong!

Pros-

Portal 2 is better than Portal in every aspect.

Better Graphics, Better Puzzles, Better Story, More Jokes...you name it.

And have you seen its price? 
It is like 1$ during sales!

Cons-

There is no Portal 3

Do I recommend it?
Definitely.
Very Good Mechanical Game, Im getting smarter and smarter in each level of the game. A good story by a good writer!. very good jokes of GLaDOS! 10/10

*Ein Freund und ich spielen grad ne schwere Map [folgende Situation trifft ein]*

Ich: Pass auf, du stellst dich auf den Schalter dann geht die Brücke hoch und ich kann mich auf der anderen Seite umsehn.
Freund: Alles klar mach ich.

*Ich dreh mich also zu dieser Brücke um und sag ihm er soll sich auf den Schalter stelln. Gesagt, getan die Brücke geht nach oben. Als der erste Fuss auf die Brücke gesetzt wurde dacht ich mir: "Er wird mich sowas von trolln."
